thread.section_title: Verc Car Rental Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Verc Car Rental | verc.com | 2 of 5
thread.title: JUDDSON
thread.title_full: Verc Car Rental reviewed by JUDDSON

author: JUDDSON
title: JUDDSON
text:
Everything about this rental was outstanding. The sales people were helpful, and provided good advice and fantastic service, everything about how the company handed the rental was explained up front.
The van was in great shape, well maintained
We were not from the area so having friendly, helpful people with good advice made our experience that much better.
Thank you, we will be sure to use this company again if we are in the area and have need.
